issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
The latest Travis build from {{branch-3.1}} is failed. 
Seems like just missed out change the dependencies version of {{standalone-metastore}} and {{upgrade-acid}} modules from {{3.1.1}} to {{3.1.2-SNAPSHOT}}
